summary: Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.
cast: Stewart Granger|Pierre Brice|Harald Leipnitz|Macha Méril|Terence Hill|Walter Barnes|Antje Weisgerber|Milan Srdoc|Gerd Frickhöffer|Veljko Maricic|Dusan Janicijevic|Slobodan Dimitrijevic|Davor Antolic|Zvonimir Crnko|Milivoje Popovic-Mavid|Ilija Ivezic|Heinz Erhardt|Stojan 'Stole' Arandjelovic|Rainer Brandt|Marinko Cosic|Petar Dobric|Thomas Eckelmann|Arne Elsholtz|Hans W. Hamacher|Sime Jagarinac|Jovan Janicijevic-Burdus|Helmo Kindermann|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Klaus W. Krause|Vladimir Leib|Arnold Marquis|Lutz Moik|Kurt Mühlhardt|Antun Nalis|Petar Petrovic|Tihomir Polanec|Hugo Schrader|Branko Supek|Slobodan Vedernjak|Hans Wocke|Christian Wolff
title: El asalto de los apaches
